chunks.text: It is with immense pleasure and pride that we reflect on the completion of volume 5 of Bioelectricity.  Over these 5 years, the journal received its first impact factor (2.3), a solid start, and its CiteScore has risen to 4.0 from 1.6.  We have published nine special issues on diverse topics ranging from plants and microbes to cancer, and we continue to seek compelling themes.  Our editorial board has expanded, and we express our gratitude to all members for their dedicated work and to our authors for their valuable contributions.  Bioelectricity maintains a global presence, having published articles from 30 countries over the past 5 years.
chunks.chunk_summary: Bioelectricity journal has achieved significant milestones in its first five years, including receiving its first impact factor, increasing its CiteScore, publishing diverse special issues, and expanding its international reach.

chunks.text: A key achievement has been the formal association with the International Society for Electroporation-Based Technologies and Treatments (ISEBTT). Bioelectricity is now the official journal of ISEBTT, and several society members have joined our editorial board, including two as associate editors. We aim to strengthen this partnership in the coming years.  The field of bioelectricity has seen remarkable publications, highlighted in the "Buzz" section.  The "My Experiments in Bioelectricity" series, featuring insights from senior scientists, and meeting reports provide valuable perspectives. Sally Adee's book "We Are Electric" generated significant interest, and we were pleased to interview her.
chunks.chunk_summary: The journal has established a formal association with ISEBTT, and the field of bioelectricity has seen notable publications and increased public interest.

chunks.text: Reflecting on the post-COVID era, the rapid development of COVID vaccines demonstrates the value of research investment. The urgency with which governments, companies, and individuals funded research led to vaccines that saved millions of lives. This same principle applies to bioelectricity, which holds immense promise across diverse fields. From biomedicine and bioengineering to agriculture, the positive impacts of bioelectricity will be felt globally as the technology transitions from academic labs to practical applications.
chunks.chunk_summary: The success of COVID vaccine development highlights the importance of research investment, a principle applicable to the promising field of bioelectricity and its potential applications.

chunks.text: At Bioelectricity, we prioritize the human element. Each article receives dedicated attention, and we are actively involved as hands-on editors in the processing and decision-making. We strive to expedite the review process and minimize workload by directly communicating with authors and avoiding unnecessary back-and-forth with reviewers. This editorial philosophy will continue as we remain committed to serving the bioelectricity community. We invite all those whose work involves the ionic phenomena of life to contribute as authors, reviewers, or editors.
chunks.chunk_summary: The journal emphasizes a hands-on editorial approach, prioritizing efficient processing and direct communication with authors to serve the bioelectricity community.

chunks.text: We anticipate exciting developments in the broad field of bioelectricity and will continue exploring how the journal can further promote and facilitate this progress. The future of bioelectricity is bright and full of potential.
chunks.chunk_summary: The journal looks forward to future advancements in bioelectricity and will continue to support the growth and progress of the field.
